{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15677v1", "title": "Affine isoperimetric type inequalities for static convex domains in
  hyperbolic space", "summary": "In this paper, the notion of hyperbolic ellipsoids in hyperbolic space is
introduced. Using a natural orthogonal projection from hyperbolic space to
Euclidean space, we establish affine isoperimetric type inequalities for static
convex domains in hyperbolic space. Moreover, equality of such inequalities is
characterized by these hyperbolic ellipsoids.", "main_category": "math.DG", "categories": "math.DG", "published": "2025-04-22T08:00:28Z"}
